memberdef.definition: std::shared_ptr< Ntree< D, index > > nest::Layer< D >::get_global_positions_ntree
memberdef.name: get_global_positions_ntree

briefdescription.para: Get positions for all nodes in layer, including nodes on other MPI processes.

detaileddescription.para: The positions will be cached so that subsequent calls for the same layer are fast. One one layer is cached at the time, so the user should group together all ConnectLayers calls using the same pool layer.

memberdef.definition: std::shared_ptr< Ntree< D, index > > nest::Layer< D >::get_global_positions_ntree
memberdef.argsstring: (std::bitset< D > periodic, Position< D > lower_left, Position< D > extent, NodeCollectionPTR node_collection)
memberdef.name: get_global_positions_ntree

briefdescription.para: Get positions globally, overriding the dimensions of the layer and the periodic flags.

detaileddescription.para: The supplied lower left corner and extent coordinates are only used for the dimensions where the supplied periodic flag is set.

briefdescription.para: Connect this layer to the given target layer.

detaileddescription.para:
The actual connections are made in class ConnectionCreator.
source_nc
NodeCollection to the source layer.
target
target layer to connect to. Must have same dimension as this layer.
target_nc
NodeCollection to the target layer.
connector
connection properties

briefdescription.para: Write layer data to stream.

detaileddescription.para:
For each node in layer, write one line to stream containing: node ID x-position y-position [z-position]

briefdescription.para: Dumps information about all connections of the given type having their source in the given layer to the given output stream.

NodeCollection of the layer
target_layer
